text: Yati matra ho'ina, baru tiniharule ta bhanchan, ki yo ‘‘kura'ana’’ ta sambhramita sapanaharuko poko ho, baru usale yasala'i aphai racihaleko cha, baru yo e'uta kavi ho, an'yatha unale ta hamro samu kunai yasto nisani li'era a'une thi'e, jasto ki pahilaka rasulaharuka lagi patha'i'eka thi'e.’’
